columns.Aircraft_ID: The unique identifier for each aircraft.
columns.Order_Year: The year the aircraft was ordered.
columns.Manufacturer: The company that manufactured the aircraft.
columns.Model: The specific model designation of the aircraft.
columns.Fleet_Series: The range and number of aircraft in the fleet.
columns.Powertrain: The type of powertrain used in the aircraft.
columns.Fuel_Propulsion: The fuel type used for propulsion of the aircraft.

aircraft.table_description: The table details aircraft specifications and ordering information.

columns.Record_ID: The unique identifier for each pilot record.
columns.Pilot_ID: The unique identifier for each pilot.
columns.Aircraft_ID: The unique identifier for each aircraft.
columns.Date: The date of the pilot's record entry.

pilot_record.table_description: The table captures records of pilots and their associated aircraft.

columns.Pilot_ID: The unique identifier for each pilot.
columns.Pilot_name: The full name of the pilot.
columns.Rank: The rank assigned to the pilot.
columns.Age: The age of the pilot in years.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship of the pilot.
columns.Position: The position played by the pilot in the team.
columns.Join_Year: The year the pilot joined the team.
columns.Team: The name of the team the pilot is associated with.

pilot.table_description: The table records details about each pilot and their team affiliation.
